answerText: Jean Racine[10] In this play by Racine, the high priest Joad attempts to install Joash on the throne to replace the title character, who has abandoned Judaism to worship Baal.
heading: VCU Closed |2013 | Maryland B and Michigan A | 14 | Literature | European | College
subject: Literature
